Posts.Content: Feb 28, 2017 08:08PM heartfull wrote: pickmorewildflower...I love that name! I am officially one week out from my BAX! I saw the PS today and had more fill. It's great to hear how you are doing 3 months out and so nice of you to take the time to help us all along. it's so nice to keep seeing the light on the other side! Lots of hugs and thank yous! XO!
